Bash(git merge --no-ff features/battle-prep -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge features/battle-prep: Battle/Prep mode system

Implements implicit mode switching for combat-aware consumable management.

## Battle Mode \(In Combat\)
- Emergency items only \(Healthstone, Health/Mana potions, Bandages\)
- Frozen layout - no button changes during combat
- Muscle memory protection
- Grey-out unavailable items \(cooldown, range, etc.\)

## Prep Mode \(Out of Combat\)
- Full consumable suite \(elixirs, food, drink, utility\)
- Dynamic reflow allowed
- Item reassignment permitted

## Configuration Options
- Visibility mode: Hide vs Grey-out unavailable items
- Per-slot battle/prep assignment
- Combat safety validation

## Technical Implementation
- Race condition fixes for InCombatLockdown\(\)
- Proper event handling for combat state changes
- No secure frame updates during combat

Completes Design Contract requirements for implicit mode switching.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
